reviewText:
just old movies I haven't seen in a long time
plays good / clear / and the sound is good
Solid and affordable four film set. Deadly Friend and Eyes of a Stranger alone are worth the price.
Great value for retro movie buff's
Absolutely loved the movies. I will order again.

No real "must see" films here, but most you may have missed.  Nice set of escapism thrillers that you don't see around much and while they are primarily three star films they are entertaining and having 4  films together that you may not have seen is a plus.  Even the early Wes Craven off kilter horror flick while not as good as the others was entertaining.  Worth a watch.
Happy I got my movie in. But it took little over a month to get it.
nice set of 4 movies I've enjoyed in the past, quality of video and audio could be better, though.
thank you ... this item was received securely on 27.04.2018
I received the package in good condition
I don't think any of these films are especially memorable, but most are fun. Michael Cain is great, and loved Oliver Stone's cameo. Pity his career went downhill from here!
Thank you. This movie was one of my childhood favorites. Brings back so many memories.
Great selection of movies. If it was me, perhaps all the movies would be Wes Craven & all 80's & 90's; however, what we have here is definitely not bad.
only movie worth purchase is eyes of stranger
The hand I thought was the best one. The other ones didn'seem that great.
